attributes.action: Stop Rotherham Metropolitan Borough Council building on Greenbelt Land
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop RMBC building on Green Belt Land around Greasbrough,Wingfield,Munsbrough and Rawmarsh otherwise known as the "Bassingthorpe wedge".The People who live in these areas have not been involved in the planning process contrary to the councils own consultation framework document.
There are no other options available to the affected communities in the "core stratergy proposals" but to accept huge new development on green belt land.
